imageobject.caption: President Obama tours Jordan's ancient city of Petra on March 23. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
President Obama's motorcade waits as he visits the ancient city of Petra, one of Jordan's most-visited tourist sites. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
U.S. security personnel patrol the ancient city of Petra, Jordan, ahead of the arrival of President Obama. Obama toured the fabled city on Saturday, described the landscape of soaring red rock...
President Obama shakes hands with King Abdullah II of Jordan as he departs Queen Alia International Airport in Amman, Jordan. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
President Obama, left, and Jordanian King Abdullah II participate in a arrival ceremony at the Al-Hummar Palace on March 22 in Amman. (Photo: Carolyn Kaster AP)
President Barack Obama and Jordan's King Abdullah II, participate in an arrival ceremony. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais AP)
President Obama arrives at Queen Alia Airport in Amman. (Photo: Mohammad Hannon, AP)
President Obama waves before boarding Air Force One before his departure from Ben Gurion International Airport in Tel Aviv. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
Israeli President Shimon Peres, left, watches as President Obama shakes hands with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu at Ben Gurion International Airport. Obama concluded his first visit...
Israeli President Shimon Peres, left, President Obama and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu observe a moment of silence in the Hall of Remembrance at the Yad Vashem Holocaust Museum...
President Obama pauses for a moment of silence after laying a wreath for victims of the Holocaust in the Hall of Remembrance. (Photo: Uriel Sinai, Getty Images)
President Obama visits the Hall of Names at the Yad Vashem Holocaust Memorial museum with Israel's Prime Minster Benjamin Netanyahu, left, Israeli President Shimon Peres, Rabbi Yisrael Meir...
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, left, President Obama and Israeli President Shimon Peres leave the grave of Theodore Herzl after a wreath laying ceremony at the Yad Vashem cemetery...
imageobject.copyrightholder: Kobi Gideon, GPO, via Getty Images

imageobject.caption: President Barack Obama talks with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu speaks with President Obama during a state dinner on March 21 in Jerusalem. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
President Obama receives the Israeli Medal of Distinction from Israeli President Shimon Peres at a state dinner. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
Israelis shout slogans during a protest against President Obama's visit. The activists are demanding the release of Jonathan Pollard, a Jewish American who was convicted in 1987 on charges...
Israelis protest against President Obama's visit. (Photo: Lior Mizrahi, Getty Images)
President Obama waves to the crowd after delivering a speech at the International Convention Center in Jerusalem. (Photo: Carolyn Kaster, AP)
Palestinians protest during a meeting between President Obama and Palestinian Authority President Mahmoud Abbas in Ramallah, West Bank. (Photo: Ilia Yefimovich, Getty Images)
President Obama tries to hear a person yelling at him during his speech at the International Convention Center. (Photo: Carolyn Kaster, AP)
Palestinians smoke water pipes at a coffee shop in Ramallah. (Photo: Bernat Armangue, AP)
President Obama pauses during his speech at the Jerusalem Convention Center. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
President Obama and Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas shake hands during a joint news conference at the Muqata Presidential Compound in Ramallah, West Bank. (Photo: Carolyn Kaster, AP)
Obama, left, and P Abbas speak during a news conference. (Photo: Saul Loeb, AFP/Getty Images)
Palestinian Prime Minister Salam Fayyad, center, and President Obama greet members of a youth dance group at the Al-Bireh Youth Center in Ramallah. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
Obama and Fayyad watch a demonstration of robotic technology. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
President Obama greets members of a youth soccer team. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
President Obama greets children during his visit to the Al-Bireh Youth Center. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
President Obama walks with Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas at the Muqata Presidential Compound in Ramallah. (Photo: Carolyn Kaster, AP)
Abbas, left, and Obama review an honor guard. (Photo: Carolyn Kaster, AP)
Police block Palestinian protesters during a rally against Obama's Mideast visit in Ramallah. (Photo: Bernat Armangue, AP)
A worker sweeps the stage before Obama speaks to Israeli students in Jerusalem. (Photo: Uriel Sinai, Getty Images)
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, left, and President Obama watch a technology demonstration at the Israel Museum in Jerusalem. (Photo: Kobi Gideon, GPO, via Getty Iimages)

A Palestinian activist wears a President Obama mask and holds a photo of civil rights icon Rosa Parks in Hebron, West Bank. (Photo: Nasser Shiyoukhi, AP)
Israeli President Shimon Peres, left, takes President Obama on a tour of the president's official residence in Jerusalem. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
Obama plants a Magnolia tree as Shimon Peres watches during a ceremony at the president's residence. (Photo: Pool photo by Pablo Martinez Monsivais)

Obama and Netayahu greet each other with smiles. (Photo: Ariel Schalit, AP)
Obama and Netanyahu demonstrate friendship. (Photo: Jack Guez, AFP/Getty Images)
Israeli President Shimon Peres, left, Obama and Netanyahu participate in a welcoming ceremony at the airport. (Photo: Jack Guez, AFP/Getty Images)
Perez, left, Obama and Netanyahu participate in a welcoming ceremony. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
Obama, center, shakes hands with Perez as Netanyahu waits. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
Obama, left, accompanied by Netanyahu, greets members of a delegation. (Photo: Pablo Martinez Monsivais, AP)
Obama arrives at Ben Gurion International Airport. (Photo: Uriel Sinai, Getty Images)
Workers make final preparations before the arrival of Obama. (Photo: Uriel Sinai, Getty Images)
A worker sets up American flags at Ben Gurion Airport. (Photo: Uriel Sinai, Getty Images)
